alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Lexington; Richland (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 30 at 11:00AM EST until December 31 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in South Carolina... Congaree River At Congaree National Park-Gadsden affecting Calhoun and Richland Counties. Congaree River At Carolina Eastman affecting Calhoun, Lexington and Richland Counties. Wateree River At Lake Wateree affecting Kershaw, Fairfield and Lancaster Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Congaree River at Carolina Eastman. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 115.0 feet, Flooding occurs in low lying areas of the Carolina Eastman Facility and at the Congaree National Park. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 AM EST Saturday the stage was 116.1 feet. - Bankfull stage is 115.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:00 AM EST Saturday was 119.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this afternoon and continue falling to 105.9 feet Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 115.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Most flooding deaths occur in vehicles. Never drive through a flooded roadway or around barricades. Turn around, don`t drown. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening by 900 pm EST.this evening at 1100 PM EST.
